expected-checkin-date.required: Your expected date of checking in is required
expected-checkin-date.start-year: Expected check in year cannot be before 2023
expected-checkin-date.end-year: Expected check in year cannot be after 2023
expected-checkin-date.start-month: Expected check in month cannot be before April 2023
expected-checkin-date.end-month: Expected check in month cannot be after December 2023

expected-checkout-date.required: Your expected date of checking out is required
expected-checkout-date.start-year: Expected check out year cannot be before 2023
expected-checkout-date.end-year: Expected check out year cannot be after 2023
expected-checkout-date.start-month: Expected check out month cannot be before April 2023
expected-checkout-date.end-month: Expected check out month cannot be after December 2023
expected-checkout-date.start-date: Expected  check out date cannot be earlier than check in date

no-of-people.required: Please specify the number of people checking in
no-of-people.min: The number of people checking in cannot be bellow 1
no-of-people.max: The number of people checkig in cannot be more than 100
